detail_desc: Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a high waist, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, pockets in the side seams, fake back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Long-sleeved Henley top in waffled cotton jersey with a button placket and an open chest pocket in jersey with a small fabric appliqué.
Long-sleeved Henley top in waffled cotton jersey with a button placket and an open chest pocket in jersey with a small fabric appliqué.
Cropped trousers in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.
Cropped trousers in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.
Bag with a flap, zipped inner compartment and narrow, adjustable shoulder strap. Lined. Depth 10 cm. Height 17 cm. Width 24 cm.
Bag with a flap, zipped inner compartment and narrow, adjustable shoulder strap. Lined. Depth 10 cm. Height 17 cm. Width 24 cm.
Short skirt in a sturdy weave. High waist with pleats for added width, discreet side pockets and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.

Long-sleeved dress in velour with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a glittery waistband and a glossy skirt in multiple layers of tulle to create volume. Lined skirt.
Gently fitted, pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels, gathered, 3/4-length sleeves, jetted side pockets and a single back vent. No fasteners. Lined.
Gently fitted, pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels, gathered, 3/4-length sleeves, jetted side pockets and a single back vent. No fasteners. Lined.
Single-breasted, straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with flap welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers at the cuffs. Recycled polyester lining.

Short blouse in cotton voile with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed button on the inside. 3/4-length puff sleeves with gathers at the top and narrow elastication and a flounce at the hems. Seam at the hem with smocking at the back and ties at one side.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Smocking at the top, buttons down the front and a flared skirt. Lined with a V-neck underdress with narrow shoulder straps. The polyester content of the underdress is recycled.
Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave. High, elasticated, drawstring waist with a frill trim, a fake fly, discreet pockets in the side seams and wide, tapered legs with creases.
Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave. High, elasticated, drawstring waist with a frill trim, a fake fly, discreet pockets in the side seams and wide, tapered legs with creases.
Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave. High, elasticated, drawstring waist with a frill trim, a fake fly, discreet pockets in the side seams and wide, tapered legs with creases.
Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave. High, elasticated, drawstring waist with a frill trim, a fake fly, discreet pockets in the side seams and wide, tapered legs with creases.
Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave. High, elasticated, drawstring waist with a frill trim, a fake fly, discreet pockets in the side seams and wide, tapered legs with creases.

Short dress in woven fabric with a pointed collar and concealed buttons down the front. Pleats at the top for a draped effect and added width, and a more fitted style at the bottom. Dropped shoulders, long, voluminous sleeves and wide cuffs with concealed buttons. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with a pointed collar and concealed buttons down the front. Pleats at the top for a draped effect and added width, and a more fitted style at the bottom. Dropped shoulders, long, voluminous sleeves and wide cuffs with concealed buttons. Unlined.
Fully-fashioned hi-top trainers with an imitation leather heel cap, ribbed shaft and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles made from partly recycled polyester. Patterned soles.
Fully-fashioned hi-top trainers with an imitation leather heel cap, ribbed shaft and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles made from partly recycled polyester. Patterned soles.

Long dress in softly draping satin with a sheen. V-neck front and back, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the bottom creating a voluminous, softly draping skirt. Slightly longer at the back. Lined at the top.

Long dress in softly draping satin with a sheen. V-neck front and back, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the bottom creating a voluminous, softly draping skirt. Slightly longer at the back. Lined at the top.

Trousers in a heavily draping viscose weave with a high, pleated waist, pockets in the side seams and flap back pockets. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening and wide, straight legs with sewn-in creases.

Trousers in a heavily draping viscose weave with a high, pleated waist, pockets in the side seams and flap back pockets. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening and wide, straight legs with sewn-in creases.

Trousers in a heavily draping viscose weave with a high, pleated waist, pockets in the side seams and flap back pockets. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening and wide, straight legs with sewn-in creases.

Short, sleeveless dress in jersey crêpe with a small opening at the front and button at the neckline, and a double-layered, gathered yoke at the shoulders and back. Seam and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist.

Short, sleeveless dress in jersey crêpe with a small opening at the front and button at the neckline, and a double-layered, gathered yoke at the shoulders and back. Seam and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist.

Short, sleeveless dress in jersey crêpe with a small opening at the front and button at the neckline, and a double-layered, gathered yoke at the shoulders and back. Seam and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist.
Sleeveless lace blouse with a concealed zip at the back. Partly lined.
Sandals with shimmering details. Ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, heel caps that are lightly padded at the top, and a small loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Sandals with shimmering details. Ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, heel caps that are lightly padded at the top, and a small loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Wrapover blouse in airy, pattern-weave fabric made from a cotton blend with a crinkled effect. V-neck, narrow ties at the waist and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Unlined.
Wrapover blouse in airy, pattern-weave fabric made from a cotton blend with a crinkled effect. V-neck, narrow ties at the waist and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Unlined.
Fully lined, slim-fit, pull-on jeans in stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Fully lined, slim-fit, pull-on jeans in stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short, A-line dress in an airy weave with tiny smocking and a V-shaped opening with ties at the neckline. Short, wide raglan sleeves, and a gathered seam at the hem for added width.
Short, A-line dress in an airy weave with tiny smocking and a V-shaped opening with ties at the neckline. Short, wide raglan sleeves, and a gathered seam at the hem for added width.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and polarised, UV-protective lenses.
Kids Exclusive. Fine cable-knit tights in a soft wool blend with soft, visible elastication at the waist.
Ankle-length trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist and extended waistband with a metal decoration and press-stud. Zip fly, fake back pockets and tapered legs.

Oversized trousers in twill made from a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell blend. High waist with pleats, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the waist. Side pockets, fake back pockets and wide legs with wide, sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit, warming wool and cashmere blend with a wide turn-up at the hem.
Bracelets in different types of metal chains with a trigger clasp. One bracelet with a decorative padlock.

Set of a long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey, a pair of shorts and a pair of fine-knit tights. Top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and a flounce extending over the shoulders. Shorts with covered elastication at the back of the waist, a fake fly and press-stud and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Tights with an elasticated waist.
Dungaree dress in soft cotton corduroy with adjustable straps that cross at the back and a seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back.
Dungaree dress in soft cotton corduroy with adjustable straps that cross at the back and a seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back.
Dungaree dress in soft cotton corduroy with adjustable straps that cross at the back and a seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back.
Dungarees in soft cotton twill with press-studs at the front and frill-trimmed straps with concealed, adjustable fasteners.
Dungarees in soft cotton twill with press-studs at the front and frill-trimmed straps with concealed, adjustable fasteners.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sandals in imitation leather with appliqués. Adjustable foot and ankle straps with a hook and loop fastening, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Trainers in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a padded top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a padded top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a padded top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Tunic in an airy linen and viscose weave with a V-neck, box pleat at the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Set with a T-shirt and matching joggers in soft fabric. Classic T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric in a casual style and relaxed fit. Easy pull-on waist with covered elastication and a drawstring. Pockets in the side seams, one back pocket, a low crotch and tapered legs with a print motif on one leg and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Trousers in soft cotton twill with covered elastication and a frill trim at the top, and side and back pockets. Relaxed fit with a wide jersey waist panel for best fit over the tummy and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Alice band covered in a patterned weave with a decorative knot detail at the top.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with long puff sleeves in airy organza and a straight hem. Ribbing at the neckline and cuffs.
Fitted top in airy, lace-patterned jersey with a round neck and long puff sleeves.

Suit trousers in a woven viscose blend with a zip fly and button. Pockets in the side seams, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Short, oversized dress in an airy cotton weave with a collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Flap chest pockets, discreet side pockets, a seam with a drawstring at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.
